column4: ok, if i want to install the default gui on the server distrobution that i have installed (will take like 60+ minutes to download desktop ubuntu) what would i do? im switching from a windows server to a linux server, im not the best with linux commands. i only know the very basics
you want sudo aptitude install ubuntu-desktop    it's going to download gnome and a lot of programs and will take a while, but not as long as an install CD
use your user password for sudo.
why do you need to mess around outside your homedir so much?
